name: Popcorn Hunter
description:
All Popcorn is gone - jump into the movies to get it back!


Being a passionate film enthusiast, it is your duty to refill the popcorn machine and enable a true popcorn-powered cinematic experience! Enter different movies by jumping into the big screen and get back the white gold!

Run, climb, swim and perform double jumps in mid-air. Defeat different baddies, find secret areas & try to get all hidden film clappers for a perfect success!


OVERVIEW

- 2D platform adventure game
- Collect as much popcorn as possible and complete the different levels
- Once you reach the cinema, unlock new movies by collecting hidden film clappers
- Benefit from infinite lives and mid-level checkpoints
- Enhance your energy meter to make your adventure easier
- Interact with different objects by touching them
- Enjoy hand-drawn pixel art and a fantastic 8bit-influenced soundtrack
- influenced by classic jump and run masterpieces like Mario
